# previousServerChangeToken

**Instance Property**

The server change token.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var previousServerChangeToken: CKServerChangeToken? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign the token you receive from the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchDatabaseChangesOperation/fetchDatabaseChangesCompletionBlock] to this property. Doing so yields only the changes that occur after your most recent fetch operation. If you specify `nil` for this parameter, the operation fetches all changes.

## Configuring the Operation

- **fetchAllChanges**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to send repeated requests to the server.
- **resultsLimit**: The maximum number of results that the operation fetches.
